abstract: A Dow Jones & Company director, Christopher Bancroft, an influential member of the family that controls the publishing company, said in an interview that he opposes a sale to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation. His comments to The Wall Street Journal, which is owned by Dow Jones, came after some members of the Bancroft family met Wednesday in Boston to consider the $5 billion offer.
lead_paragraph: A Dow Jones & Company director, Christopher Bancroft, an influential member of the family that controls the publishing company, said in an interview that he opposes a sale to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation. His comments to The Wall Street Journal, which is owned by Dow Jones, came after some members of the Bancroft family met Wednesday in Boston to consider the $5 billion offer.

headline.main: Bancroft Family Member Opposes Dow Jones Sale
